channel.title: without on Datafortress.cloud
channel.description: Recent content in without on Datafortress.cloud

item.title: Tech NEWS 2022-02-16
item.description: A first look at Microsoft’s new Windows 11 Android apps support (3 minute read) Microsoft has released the first preview of its Android app support in Windows 11 to testers in the Windows Insider program.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-12-13
item.description: Samsung’s working on a rollable smartwatch with a camera (4 minute read) Samsung filed a patent in June for a Galaxy Watch with a rollable screen.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-09-10
item.description: Amazon starts making its own TVs with new Fire TV Omni and 4-Series (4 minute read) Amazon has announced its Omni and 4-Series Amazon-branded 4K Fire TVs.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-08-17
item.description: US investigates Autopilot after 11 Teslas crashed into emergency vehicles (4 minute read) US government regulators are opening an investigation into Tesla’s Autopilot system.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-05-31
item.description: Nvidia is making a 3D map of the universe with the world’s most powerful AI supercomputer (2 minute read) Nvidia’s Perlmutter supercomputer is the fastest in the world for AI workloads.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-05-25
item.description: Google now lets you password-protect the page that shows all your searches (2 minute read) Google users now have the option to add a password to their Web and Activity page.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-03-12
item.description: Netflix Begins Test to Crack Down on Password Sharing Outside Your Household (2 minute read) Some Netflix TV users have started seeing a notification prompting them to get their own accounts if they don’t live with the owner of the account.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-03-09
item.description: SpaceX moves to beam Starlink internet into cars, boats, and aircraft (3 minute read) SpaceX is seeking regulatory approval to connect its Starlink network to cars, trucks, shipping boats, and aircraft.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-12-23
item.description: Elon Musk says Apple refused a meeting to acquire Tesla (2 minute read) Elon Musk attempted to sell Tesla to Apple during the Model 3 rollout in 2017.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-11-18
item.description: Amazon jumps into the pharmacy business with online prescription fulfillment, free delivery for Prime members (6 minute read) Amazon Pharmacy has launched in the US.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-10-27
item.description: Facebook unveils free-to-play cloud gaming service (7 minute read) Facebook Gaming has been launched in beta for a limited group of people.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-09-30
item.description: Amazon jumps into virtual tourism, offering live one-on-one experiences around the world (5 minute read) Amazon Explore is Amazon’s new tech platform and marketplace that offers access to live virtual experiences with people from around the world.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-09-08
item.description: Minecraft is coming to PlayStation VR as a free upgrade later this month (1 minute read) Minecraft will be playable for free on PlayStation VR later this month.
